column3: Latest;Siem Reap: A foreigner living in a rented room in Siem Reap died of cirrhosis at about 10:10 am on November 19
column7: a female Norwegian national was found in her room in Sla Kram
column8: and was inspected by local police and the court doctor
column9: who concluded she had died of advanced cirrhosis.------Her body was taken to the pagoda in Teuk Thla
column11: awaiting her family and embassy’s decision.
